title: The Writer's Almanac - Sunday, December 8, 2019
description: Today is the birthday of the humorist and cartoonist James Thurber, who said, “Humor is emotional chaos remembered in tranquility.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of the humorist and cartoonist James Thurber, who said, “Humor is emotional chaos remembered in tranquility.”
